description: The pineapple (Ananas comosus 'Sugarloaf') is truly amazing. Its beautiful crown of terrestrial, evergreen leaves makes its presence known in any room or garden. Nutritionally, pineapple is a powerhouse, filled with Vitamin C and manganese, as well as bromelain, an enzyme that promotes digestion and healing. Its bright, sweet succulence is a treat for the taste buds. Add to that the fact that its 'Sugarloaf' variety is small, compact, and asks for little space or water for growth, and it's easy to see why this fruit is so incredible.
